channel.title: wix on I Prefer Jim
channel.description: Recent content in wix on I Prefer Jim

item.title: Tips for debugging a WiX MSI
item.description: WiX is an excellent technology that simplifies the creation of MSI files using an XML abstraction on top of the Windows Installer APIs.

item.title: “Unable to update the dependencies of the project”
item.description: I’ve recently had to switch from Visual Studio 2012 back to Visual Studio 2010 to do maintenance on another project. This project is currently stuck in Visual Studio 2010 until I have time to convert the old setup projects to WiX.

item.title: WiX Installer Update
item.description: One thing that has caused me quite a few problems with my WiX installer was optionally displaying a dialog to enter SQL information when the database is installed.

item.title: WiX: First impressions.
item.description: After working with WiX today, I realized that it’s not perfect. But, it isn’t horrible. Maybe my issues are from following “tutorials” that are written for WiX 2.
